thread.title: MR. & MRS. LACOMBE
thread.title_full: Oshawa Carpet One Floor & Home reviewed by MR. & MRS. LACOMBE

author: MR. & MRS. LACOMBE
title: MR. & MRS. LACOMBE
text: We were very happy with the purchase and installation of our new kitchen flooring. All staff at Carpet One were friendly, knowledgeable and very accommodating. Tony did an excellent job of the installation - arriving on time and clean-up afterwards. Excellent service all around.
